title: Can't reconnect to the game
body:
Hi

I was playing a ranked match and i got randomly disconnected, first i thought the problem came from me, but everything was fine.
The attempting to reconnect message was just reconnecting for 5 minutes and i closed the game and restarted my launcher.
Now i don't have the option to reconnect to the game but i can look for a new match.
What is this?
Am I going to lose LP again for something i didn't wanted to ? 

Thank you

replies.body: It sounds like the match might have resulted in a remake, which would cause it to end and return you to the lobby.  Disconnecting randomly like this can also indicate an unstable connection, so it's important to get that fixed up to stay in game!  You'll want to go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot whatever is causing your network to drop out of the game server.  Let me know if you have any questions!
